events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back due to receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for the incorrect item delivery reported by the customer.
Hello! I'm Sarah from support. Sorry to hear you got the wrong item. I'll assist you with the refund process right away.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number? This will help speed up the refund process.
Thank you for the quick response. I have attached the photo of the item I received and my order number is 123456789.
Thanks for the details. We will process your refund and you should see the money back on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
I appreciate the quick resolution offer. Looking forward to the refund, and thanks for handling this so smoothly.
Your refund request has been fully processed. Please check your account in the next few days for the refund confirmation.
Just checking in to ensure that you received your refund successfully. Please let us know if there's anything else we can help with.
Yes, the refund appeared in my account yesterday. Thank you again for the excellent support and quick turnaround.
We are glad your issue is resolved. Closing this case now, but feel free to reach out anytime for further assistance.
